title: Thunder Wolves
body:
Thunder Wolves

After ordering everything that he could buy with his limited merit points Evan can't help but shake his head.

"If I'd known things would be so expensive at the merit shop, I wouldn't have shared the merit points that Aqua collected during Monster Tide"

The only reason Evan shared Aqua's merit points with Sophie and others was because he felt he collected enough points to buy whatever he wanted from the merit shop.

But only now he realized how wrong he was to think that he would be able to buy whatever he wanted.

"I should have tried even harder to collect more merit points. It was such a good opportunity to get things that you can't buy normally" Evan said because it is almost impossible to buy things like A rank artefacts or skill books normally.

To get your hands on these kinds of things, other than the money you also need connections with the high ranking people of the society.
